title: FAKE ALERT: No, this woman is not Canadian PM Justin Trudeau's wife - Times of India
subtitle: News News: A video of a woman talking about having contracted Covid-19 is being widely shared with a claim that it is Canadian PM Justin Trudeau's wife Sophie Tr
author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
vclaim: A video of a woman talking about having contracted Covid-19 is being widely shared with a claim that it is Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau 's wife Sophie Trudeau In the video she filmed from inside an Intensive Care Unit (ICU) of a hospital, the woman says, "If anyone is thinking of taking any chances, just take a look at me. I am in the Intensive Care Unit." She urges people who smoke to quit saying,'You need your lungs.'Many Times Fact Check readers sent us the video on our WhatsApp number 85270 01433 along with the message they received with the video saying, "The Canadian PM’s wife. For people who are still not taking it seriously," and asked if the woman in the video is indeed Sophie Trudeau.Many Facebook users are sharing the video claiming the woman in the video is Sophie.The same video is being shared with the same claim on Twitter as well.No, the woman in the video is not Canadian PM Justin Trudeau's wife Sophie Trudeau.The woman has been identified as Tara Jane Langston from London.The woman's British accent is evident in the video.A simple search on Google with keywords 'woman icu infected coronavirus' led us to a report titled, 'Woman who filmed coronavirus warning receives online abuse', published in The Guardian, carrying the video in question.The report identifies the woman as Tara Jane Langston, 39, from London, who was hospitalised after she contracted Covid-19. Tara Jane, who was diagnosed with Covid-19 last Sunday, filmed herself in the ICU, and sent the video to a WhatsApp group with her colleagues, the report said.Sophie Trudeau tested positive for the new coronavirus on March 12, 2020. An Associated Press report carried by TOI , published on March 13, 2020, said she is feeling well and will remain in isolation. Justin Trudeau has also quarantined himself.Times Fact Check has found that a British woman's video, in which she talks about having contracted Covid-19, is being widely shared with a false claim that the woman is Canadian PM Justin Trudeau's wife Sophie Trudeau.
